body.noscript: You need to enable JavaScript to run this app.

div.style: position: fixed; z-index: 9999; inset: 16px; pointer-events: none;

span.class: ml-auto bg-rhinoBlue-600 text-white font-bold p-2 rounded-lg hidden md:block
ml-auto bg-rhinoBlue-600 text-white font-bold p-2 rounded-lg block md:hidden

div.class: bg-rhinoBlue-700 rounded-lg max-w-7xl mx-auto py-4 px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 flex justify-between
absolute bottom-0 right-0 p-2 text-xs text-gray-400
